effect.1: All entangled Variations may activate involuntarily {{USE:vars.stimulus}}, possibly at highly inconvenient moments for {{NAME}}. For Directed Variations, the Storyteller may offer a Beat to take direction of the Variation for a single turn on which {{NAME}} does not do so (or select its target and effect at random). Once activated, {{NAME}} can deactivate an entangled Variation as an instant action, even if the stimulus persists, but it might reactivate a short while later (turns in action scenes, minutes in other scenes) if the stimulus is still present.{{BR}}{{NAME}} may activate any entangled Variations voluntarily with a successful Scar Finesse roll.
effect.2: {{INLINEOPTION:vars.option}}{{BR}}Any Variations activated in this manner are considered Overt for this scene.{{BR}}{{NAME}} may activate any entangled Variations voluntarily with a successful {{TOOLTIP:tiny-tooltip,Scar Finesse,{{NAMEVALUE:scarFinesse}} + {{NAMEVALUE:acclimation}} + Variation Magnitude}} roll.
effect.3: All entangled Variations activate involuntarily {{USE:vars.stimulus}} unless {{NAME}} makes a successful {{TOOLTIP:tiny-tooltip,Scar Resistance,{{NAMEVALUE:scarResistance}} + {{NAMEVALUE:acclimation}} - Instability Penalty}} roll. If exposure continues, the Storyteller may call for more Scar Resistance rolls — no more often than once per turn in action scenes, once every several minutes in non-action scenes — with a penalty equal to the number of consecutive successful Scar Resistance rolls {{NAME}} has made this scene.{{BR}}Any Variations activated in this manner are considered Overt for this scene.{{BR}}Once the Variations are active, {{NAME}} cannot deactivate them while in the presence of the stimulus. effect.1: {{NAME}} sometimes becomes someone else: {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}}.{{BR}}{{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} has an entirely different personality — including tastes, hobbies, and Aspiration — but it largely takes a live-and-let-live approach to their shared body: It won't ruin {{NAME}}'s life as long as {{NAME}} does it the same courtesy. Aside from the difference in Aspiration, {{NAME}} and {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} share all Attributes, Skills, and other traits. Each remembers what the other persona does, but only vaguely or as dreams. {{NAME}}'s player should control the character even when {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} manifests, although the Storyteller should feel free to feed {{him}} information only {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} would know.{{BR}}{{NAME}} may accept a Beat to change personas at a time when doing so creates a significant complication for {{him}} or {{his}} cohort — whether this places the {{NAME}} or {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} in command.{{OPTIONLIST:this.selectedDeviations}}

options.invoked: Deviation -- Invoked: {{NAME}} may voluntary yield control of her body to {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} as an action. This requires a turn in action scenes (a minute, in non-action scenes) and lasts the normal length of time based on Magnitude. This doesn't count toward the Storyteller's once-per-chapter limit.
options.inferiorPersona: Deviation -- Inferior Persona: {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} cannot activate Variations other than those entangled with this Scar.
options.superiorPersona: Deviation -- Superior Persona: {{NAME}} cannot activate any Variations entangled with this Scar. These are only accessible when {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} takes the reins.
options.bestial: Deviation -- Bestial: When {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} takes control, {{NAME}} loses touch with {{his}} humanity. Sapient thought eludes {{him}}, and {{his}} higher brain functions erode. At best, this causes stronger fight-or-flight instincts; at worst, it turns {{NAME}} into a mindless beast. {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} suffers the {{TOOLTIP:Bestial Condition,json.conditions.bestial}}, which does not resolve until the end of the scene. {{He}} can't build equipment or plan ahead for a scene beyond the current one.
options.blackouts: Deviation -- Blackouts: {{NAME}} doesn't remember anything {{DISPLAY:vars.alterEgoName}} does while it is dominant.
